data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,151,738 lost in Quảng Ninh that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Quảng Ninh, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Quảng Ninh, Vietnam a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 82 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Quảng Ninh, Vietnam.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Quảng Ninh, Vietnam, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Quảng Ninh to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Ngai people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Ngai people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Ngai people is yours.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Quảng Ninh.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 25,462 believers in Quảng Ninh, Vietnam how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 235 new simple churches in the state of Quảng Ninh, Vietnam. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,177,200 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

location.name: Quảng Ninh
location.cities_list: Hạ Long, Cẩm Phả Mines, Cẩm Phả, Móng Cái, Thành Phố Uông Bí
